name: F.O.X. Agent
description:
Embark on a dangerous mission as F.O.X. Agent deep behind enemy lines.

Your objective is to complete each mission using stealth and strategy with as few engagements as possible, as these will increase the awareness of all enemies, making your mission much more difficult.

Remember, less is more! Think twice before shooting.

-------------------------------------------------------

Don't forget to let us know what you thought about it in the comments. We'd love to hear your feedback.

Thanks a bunch for your interest in our game! We hope you enjoy it!

Big thanks to aaaleee for the Scanlines Effect code:

https://github.com/aaaleee/UnityScanlinesEffect
